# Decompiled on CTFever Premium

import base64

def reverse_string(s):
    return s[::-1]


def scramble_flag(flag):
    scrambled = ''
    for i, char in enumerate(flag):
        if i % 2 == 0:
            scrambled += chr(ord(char) + 1)
            continue
        scrambled += chr(ord(char) - 1)
    return scrambled


def main():
    secret_flag = scramble_flag(reverse_string(base64.b64decode('Q0hIe3B5dGhvbjJFeGlfUmV2ZXJzZV9FTmdpbmVyaW5nfQ==')).decode())
    print('Welcome to PyReverser!')
    print('Please enter a word or phrase:')
    user_input = input()
    generated_value = scramble_flag(reverse_string(user_input.upper()))
    print('Generated value:', generated_value)
    print('Can you find the hidden flag?')
    reversed_flag = reverse_string(secret_flag)
    print('Reversed flag:', reversed_flag)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
    # return None

from Crypto.Util import number

def padding_pkcs7(data,block_size=4):
	tmp = len(data) + (block_size - len(data) % block_size)

	return list(int.from_bytes(data[i:i+block_size],'little') for i in range(0,len(data),block_size))

	return (data+shift)&0xffffffff

def mul_func(data,mul):
	return (data*mul)&0xffffffff

def xor_shift_right_func(data,bit_loc):

0x00 Gi·ªõi thi·ªáu

L·∫ßn ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n t√¥i quan t√¢m ƒë·∫øn n·ªôi suy Lagrange l√† khi ƒë·ªçc b√†i vi·∫øt c·ªßa Tr·∫ßn Xu√¢n B√°ch (fextivity) tr√™n t·∫°p ch√≠ VNOI 2023. 0x01 N·ªôi suy Lagrange

V·ªõi m·ªçi s·ªë t·ª± nhi√™n $n \geq 0$ v√† t·∫≠p $n + 1$ ƒëi·ªÉm $(x_1,y_1), (x_2,y_2), ‚Ä¶, (x_{n+1}, y_{n+1})$ v·ªõi c√°c ƒëi·ªÉm $x_i$ ƒë√¥i m·ªôt ph√¢n bi·ªát. T·ªìn t·∫°i duy nh·∫•t ƒëa th·ª©c $P(x)$ b·∫≠c $n$ th·ªèa m√£n: $P(x_i) = y_i$ $\forall i, i = \overline{1,{n+1}}$

ƒêa th·ª©c $P$ s·∫Ω ƒë∆∞·ª£c t√°ch th√†nh $n + 1$ ƒëa th·ª©c con:

\[P = P_1 + P_2 + ... + P_{n+1}\]

  • $P_i(x_i) = y_i$

C√¥ng th·ª©c t·ªïng qu√°t ƒë·ªÉ t√≠nh $P_i$ l√†:

\[P_i(x) = y_i \frac{x - x_1}{x_i - x_1} \frac{x - x_2}{x_i - x_2} ... \frac{x - x_{i-1}}{x_i - x_{i-1}} \frac{x - x_{i+1}}{x_i - x_{i+1}} ... \frac{x - x_{n+1}}{x_i - x_{n+1}}\] \[= y_i \prod_{i \neq j} \frac{x - x_j}{x_i - x_j}\]

C√¥ng th·ª©c t·ªïng qu√°t ƒë·ªÉ t√≠nh $P$ l√†:

\[P(x) = y_1 \prod_{j \neq 1} \frac{x - x_j}{x_1 - x_j} + y_2 \prod_{j \neq 2} \frac{x - x_j}{x_2 - x_j} + ... + y_{n+1} \prod_{j \neq {n+1}} \frac{x - x_j}{x_{n+1} - x_j}\] \[= \displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^{n+1} y_i \prod_{j \neq i} \frac{x - x_j}{x_i - x_j}\]

B√†i to√°n 1. Cho ƒëa th·ª©c $f(x) \in R[x]$ c√≥ b·∫≠c l√† $n$ th·ªèa m√£n c√°c ƒëi·ªÅu ki·ªán sau:

\[f(0) = 0, f(1) = \frac 1 2, f(2) = \frac 2 3, ..., f(n) = \frac{n}{n+1}\]

T√≠nh gi√° tr·ªã c·ªßa $f(n+1)$.

B√†i gi·∫£i.

√Åp d·ª•ng c√¥ng th·ª©c n·ªôi suy Lagrange v·ªõi $n+1$ m·ªëc n·ªôi suy $x_i = i,$ $\forall i = \overline{1, {n+1}}$, ta c√≥:

\[f(x) = \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} f(i) \prod_{j \neq i} \frac{x - j}{i - j} = \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} \frac{i}{i+1} \prod_{j \neq i} \frac{x - j}{i - j}\]

V·ªõi $x = n+1$

\[f(n+1) = \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} \frac{i}{i+1} \prod_{j \neq i} \frac{n+1-j}{i - j}\]

\[\prod_{j \neq i} \frac{n+1-j}{i - j} = \frac{(n+1)!}{(n+1-i)i!(n-i)!} (-1)^{n-i}\]

V√¨ v·∫≠y,

\[f(n+1) = \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} \frac{i}{i+1} \frac{(n+1)!}{(n+1-i)i!(n-i)!} (-1)^{n-i} = \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} (-1)^{n-i} i \frac{(n+1)!}{(n+1-i)!(i+1)!} = \frac{1}{n+2} \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} (-1)^{n-i} i C_{n+2}^{i+1}\]

B√†i to√°n 2. (IMO Shortlist 1981) Cho ƒëa th·ª©c $P(x) \in R[x]$ c√≥ $degP(x) = n$ th·ªèa m√£n ƒëi·ªÅu ki·ªán:

\[P(k) = \frac{1}{C_{n+1}^k}, \forall k = \overline{0, n}\]

T√≠nh $P(n+1)$.

B√†i gi·∫£i.

√Åp d·ª•ng c√¥ng th·ª©c n·ªôi suy Lagrange v·ªõi $n+1$ m·ªëc n·ªôi suy $x_i = i,$ $\forall i = \overline{0,n}$, ta c√≥:

\[P(x) = \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} \Bigg[ P(i) \prod_{j = 0\\j \neq i}^{n} \frac{x - x_j}{x_i - x_j}\Bigg] = \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} \Bigg[ \frac{1}{C_{n+1}^i} \prod_{j = 0\\j \neq i}^{n} \frac{x - j}{i - j}\Bigg]\]

V·ªõi $x=n+1$:

\[P(n+1) = \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} \Bigg[ \frac{1}{C_{n+1}^i} \prod_{j = 0\\j \neq i}^{n} \frac{n+1-j}{i - j} \Bigg]\] \[= \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} \Bigg[ \frac{1}{C_{n+1}^i i! (n-i)! (-1)^{n-i}} \prod_{j = 0\\j \neq i}^{n} \frac{n+1-j}{i - j} \Bigg]\] \[= \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} \Bigg[ \frac{n+1-i}{(n+1)! (-1)^{n-i}} \prod_{j = 0\\j \neq i}^{n} \frac{n+1-j}{i - j} \Bigg]\] \[= \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} \Bigg[ \frac{n+1-i}{(n+1)! (-1)^{n-i}} \frac{(n+1)!}{n+1-i} \Bigg] = \displaystyle \sum_{i=0}^{n} \frac{1}{(-1)^{n-i}}\]

V·∫≠y v·ªõi $n$ ch·∫µn th√¨ $P(n+1) = 1$ c√≤n $n$ l·∫ª th√¨ $P(n+1) = 0$.
